forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
